Your Name 
Software Tester 
City, Country  •  (123) 456-789  •  yourname@resumeworded.com  •  linkedin.com/in/your-profile 
EXPERIENCE 
Resume WordedJune 2020 - Present 
Lead Software Tester 
Pioneered a strategic initiative to implement AI-driven testing procedures, increasing code coverage by 45% and 
reducing bug detection time by 30% 
Spearheaded a cross-functional team to adopt Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) practices, 
resulting in a 20% improvement in deployment frequency 
Orchestrated a complete overhaul of the manual testing framework, which led to a reduction of regression testing 
time by 50%, saving 100+ hours monthly 
Designed and executed comprehensive test plans for high-stakes software rollouts, ensuring a 99% success rate 
on initial product launches 
Mentored a team of 8 junior testers, enhancing team productivity by 25% and fostering a culture of technical 
excellence and innovation 
Coached.comJanuary 2017 - May 2020 
Senior Software Tester 
Revolutionized the company’s testing processes by integrating Behavior Driven Development (BDD), enhancing 
test accuracy and stakeholder communication 
Led a targeted project to reduce technical debt, diminishing error rates by 40% through rigorous test automation 
Collaborated with developers to establish a Selenium-based automation framework, which reduced testing cycle 
time by 35% 
IBMMay 2014 - December 2016 
Software Tester 
Executed over 500 test cases for enterprise-level software, resulting in an enhancement of software reliability by 
25% 
Utilized Python to develop test scripts, shortening the testing phase by three weeks for a critical software update 
Contributed to the creation of a bug-tracking system that hastened issue resolution times by 15% 
MicrosoftJanuary 2012 - April 2014 
Junior Software Tester 
Identified and documented an average of 30 critical bugs per month, directly leading to more stable release 
candidates 
Participated in weekly product team meetings to provide insightful feedback on user experience and potential 
improvements 
EDUCATION 
Resume Worded InstituteApril 2023 
Certified Software Testing Professional (CSTP) 
Acquired expertise in advanced testing methodologies and tools, enhancing quality assurance strategies 
Resume Worded UniversityMay 2016 
Master of Science in Computer Science 
Focused on Software Quality Assurance, Performance Testing, and Agile Methodologies 
Part-time program completed alongside full-time employment 
SKILLS 
Testing Methodologies: Manual Testing, Automated Testing, Regression Testing, Acceptance Testing, 
Performance/Load Testing, Security Testing 
Automation Tools: Selenium WebDriver, QTP/UFT, TestComplete, SoapUI, Postman, JMeter 
Programming & Scripting: Java, Python, C#, Bash, SQL, JavaScript 
Other Tools & Technologies: Git, Jenkins, Docker, JIRA, Agile/Scrum Methodologies, DevOps Practices 
OTHER 
Certifications: ISTQB Advanced Level Test Analyst (2022), Certified SAFe 5 Practitioner (2021) 
Leadership & Volunteering: Volunteer Code Instructor for CodeNewbie since 2019, Mentor for Women Who Code 
since 2020 
Awards: Employee of the Year, Coached.com (2019), IBM Excellence Award in Software Testing (2016) 
Publications: Co-authored 'Efficient Test Automation Practices’ in Testing Circus Magazine, Featured in 
TechBeacon's 'Top QA Influencers' article (2018)
